This is the main plotting module. It provides support for the following plot types:

- Boxplot
- Histogram
- Density plot
- Bar plot
- Scatter (2D and 3D)
- Map (choropleth map)
- Volcano plot

## Exporting plots

To export a plot:

- Use the plotting drop-down menu (second of the top-right menus) to switch on "Modebar"
- Set the theme, palette, output format, output height, and output width
- Hover over plot and click the camera icon "Download plot"

For example, for journal publications you may want to be in light mode using the top-right
switch and select the "Grid" theme from the Plot drop-down:

```{r}
#| label: fig-export
#| echo: false

#| fig-cap: The Plot options drop-down allows setting plot export options

```
